PRICE_MONITORING.INDICATOR_1: Displays Big Data gains from project success.
PRICE_MONITORING.INDICATOR_2: Shows GT gross profit in the current month for PDVs included in the assessment.
PRICE_MONITORING.INDICATOR_3: Shows GT baseline gross profit for PDVs included in the assessment.
PRICE_MONITORING.INDICATOR_4: Shows GC gross profit in the current month for PDVs included in the assessment.
PRICE_MONITORING.INDICATOR_5: Shows GC baseline gross profit for PDVs included in the assessment.
PRICE_MONITORING.INDICATOR_10: Indicator showing the gain in percentage points and monetary value of the project.

DASHBOARD.PARTICIPANT_GAS_STATION: Gas stations that participated in the project
DASHBOARD.GROUPS_GROWTH_VS_BASELINE: Groups' growth % compared to their baseline
DASHBOARD.GROWTH_CALCULATION_HINT: (Gross Profit month - Gross Profit baseline) / Gross Profit baseline
DASHBOARD.STATIONS_ENTERED_FOR_RESULT_ASSESSMENT: Stations included in the results assessment
DASHBOARD.HOW_WE_CALCULATE_PROJECT_RESULT: How do we calculate the project result?
DASHBOARD.TOTAL_PROJECT_RESULT_CALCULATION: Total project result calculation for the month (p.p) and (BRL)
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_1_TEXT: Monetary gain and growth % generated by the project. To check the calculations,
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_1_SUFFIX: or go to the 'Results Assessment' tab.
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_2_TEXT: Monetary gain generated by the project. To check the calculations,
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_2_SUFFIX: or go to the 'Results Assessment' tab.
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_3: Percentage growth of the groups compared to their baseline.
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_5: Gross Profit (R$) per enhanced product generated by the stations in the Treatment Group (those that received a recommendation).
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_6: Proportion (Gross Profit R$) of enhanced products in relation to the total products (enhanced + regular) for the Treatment Group.
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_7: Proportion (Gross Profit R$) of enhanced products in relation to the total (enhanced + corresponding regular) for both Treatment and Control groups.
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_8: States that achieved the highest growth in Gross Profit (comparison of treatment group stations to their baseline).
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_9: Cities that achieved the highest growth in Gross Profit (comparison of treatment group stations to their baseline).
DASHBOARD.INDICATOR_10: Average price gap practiced by Vibra for the enhanced product compared to its corresponding regular product.

ASSESSMENT.INDICATOR_1: Displays Big Data gains from project success.
